OB: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails. In the 'Export' dialog window, when selecting both projects created earlier, and giving the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip') and starting the export to zip file, an error message box pops up. The error details indicate that the file of the same name in project 2 is the problem.
